OOC: I at first wasn't sure if I could vote in this one. Not only am I seem=
ingly not too much an important part of this RPG, despite the general curre=
nt lack of members, and the fact that I've been here for getting close to 2=
 years, but also I am not involved in this restart. I have very few charact=
ers. Characters that, if the RPG is restarted, will still be together (Inse=
cticons, specifically), and therefore it wouldn't harm me to vote yes. Howe=
ver, I don't think I could vote yes, because I am apposed to restarting the=
 RPG. I have decided to vote no. It just doesn't make sense to me to end th=
e saga of Neo Beast Wars. It's a great saga that we've worked hard over the=
 years to keep going. I don't think that we could suddenly pretend it never=
 happened, I think it's impossible. Maybe if we ended it and started the se=
quel, I wouldn't mind so much, but otherwise, my vote is no. Thank you for =
reading this if you even did...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: nb=
wrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, January=
 18, 2002 6:05 PM
  Subject: New poll for nbwrpg



  Enter your vote today=
!  A new poll has been created for the 
  nbwrpg group:

  A general RESTAR=
T of the rpg has been 
  suggested, and there has been a 
  favourable reac=
ion. This is the vote 
  for whether you think that we should 
  go through=
 with it. 

  NOTE: Do NOT simply vote No because it 
  wouldn't benifit yo=
u, or because you 
  wouldn't like it. Likewise of voting 
  Yes.

  Do you=
 think that restarting the rpg 
  should happen? 

    o Yes. 
    o No. 

=

  To vote, please visit the following web page:

  http://groups.yahoo.com=
/group/nbwrpg/polls 

  Note: Please do not reply to this message. Poll vot=
es are 
  not collected via email. To vote, you must go to the Yahoo! Group=
s 
  web site listed above.

  Thanks!
